Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2007 05:46AM BettyNorton wrote: Cindy - I am doing the same thing, waiting on bone scan and density test results. The onc requested them because I was starting on Femara which it seems makes changes to bone. So, I went into an anxiety attack going to the center...no reason to think there is anything other than arthitis and a well used skeleton - but anxiety ruled anyhow. Women who are long time survivors tell me they still get anxiety over tests - so I guess we live with it.
